source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot features a rack focus effect. The video begins with a completely blurred, abstract image of green and white. It then sharpens to reveal a view of a waterfall cascading down a rock face, framed by the dark silhouettes of tree leaves in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot features a rack focus effect. The video begins with a completely blurred, abstract image of green and white. It then sharpens to reveal a view of a waterfall cascading down a rock face, framed by the dark silhouettes of tree leaves in the foreground.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of birds flies across the sky as the focus shifts to reveal the waterfall.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenery shot features a rack focus effect. The video begins with a completely blurred, abstract image of green and white. As the focus shifts to reveal a view of a waterfall cascading down a rock face, a group of birds flies across the sky, framed by the dark silhouettes of tree leaves in the foreground.
